actions.description: The clockwork makes two Lancing Bolt attacks or one Lancing Bolt attack and one Harpoon attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Lancing Bolt

actions.description: 7 to hit, range 50/200 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). While grappled in this way, a creature's speed isn't reduced, but it can move only in directions that bring it closer to the clockwork. A creature takes 5 (1d10) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. The clockwork can grapple only one creature at a time with its harpoon.
actions.name: Harpoon

actions.description: The clockwork launches an explosive charge at a point within 120 feet. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Explosive Bolt (Recharge 5-6)

conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak
name: Clockwork Oaken Bolter [MoM]

specialTraits.description: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
